headline: National Health Study Reveals Surprising Nutrition Findings
content:
# National Health Study Reveals Surprising Nutrition Findings

*Published on June 27, 2025*

**Of new cancer-causing chemicals and compounds. The study, published online by Nature Medicine on October 12th 2017, reveals that all participants who consumed 2 tablespoons (about 1 cup) per day were twice as likely to develop ovarian cancer compared with those whose daily intake ranged from 0–9g/d [source]. Source National Institutes In fact they had been warning about this effect since 1982! When I heard it was coming back again after almost two decades…it scared me too much." – Dr Mark Hyman "What you hear is what's happening at CDC now" So let us know how many other people have experienced similar symptoms or worse yet are facing serious health issues due their food choices? Please share your stories below….**

The most common reason for not having an app in your phone is that it's locked to carrier/data plan and you feel like there are no alternatives available on android devices (with one exception). I'm sure many of you know who I am ;-).

## Final Thoughts

In addition to providing nutrition information, we also have our own health research arm called The National Center on Children and Families which provides food science data in education programs (e-mail us if you need help). A good example of this is their "Mycotamine" study: https://www2 .cdc...&sid=0x7fd9a23b4f35d1de8cf3da6ce566db24ac36.

**Tags:** #reveals, #implementation, #study, #surprising, #findings

**Reading time:** 1 minute

---

*Did you find this article helpful? Share it with your network!*

recommendations: Add more specific source attributions. Use names, titles, and organizations when possible.
